snippet: Nigel Sears, Ana Ivanovic’s coach and Andy Murray’s father-in-law, was taken to the hospital after collapsing at the Australian Open, and Victoria Azarenka defeated Naomi Osaka....

byline.contributor: Christopher Clarey and Karen Crouse contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Nigel Sears, Ana Ivanovic’s coach and Andy Murray’s father-in-law, was taken to the hospital after collapsing at the Australian Open, and Victoria Azarenka defeated Naomi Osaka.
abstract: Tennis Roundup; Victoria Azarenka goes on to defeat Naomi Osaka in third round of Australian Open tennis tournament, nearly hour after Nigel Sears, Ana Ivanovic’s coach and Andy Murray’s father-in-law, collapsed and was taken to hospital; other tournament matches noted.

headline.main: Health Scare Eclipses Action on Courts; Bottom of Draw Offers Path for Azarenka
headline.print_headline: Health Scare Eclipses Action on Courts; Bottom of Draw Offers Path for Azarenka
